坺字的基本解释

坺
fá
古同“垡”。
尘。
古地名。

坺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fá］
［《廣韻》房越切，入月，奉。］
［《廣韻》蒲撥切，入末，並。］
(1)耕地翻土。
(2)指初耕翻起的土块。参阅清段玉裁《说文解字注》。

坺字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　坺； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页227第04
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?房越切，音伐。地名。　又蒲撥切，音跋。【說文】治也。一曰臿土謂之坺。　又【集韻】北末切，音茇。發土也。【周語】王耕一坺。亦作墢。

考證：〔【說文】治也。一曰，鍤土謂之坺。〕　謹照原文鍤土改臿土。
坺字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
坺字的起名意思

暂无。

dust.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fá］
["Guangyun" the room is more cut, into the moon, bong. ]
["Guang Yun" Pu Bo cut, enter the end, and merge. ]
(1) Cultivated land is turned over.
(2) Refers to the soil block that was first cultivated. Refer to "Shuowen Jiezi Annotation" by Yucai of Qing Dynasty.
Li
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　坺; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 227 04
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] The more the room is cut, the sound is cut. Place name.　Pump and cut again, sound post. [Said Wen] Zhi Ye. One said that Nian Tu is called 坺.　[Jiyun] North end cut, sound long. It also started. 【Zhou Yu】Wang Geng Yili. Also used as a mao. Textual research: [[Said Wen] Zhi Ye. One said, Qiu Tu is called 坺. 〕　I would like to change the soil according to the original text.
